comments:
Build ID: M20070921-1145

Steps To Reproduce:
I'm using Clearcase and performing an operation that results in a lot of files being checked out. This requires that a decorator icon be added to each of those files in the project explorer. While items in the PE are being updated a NPE happens. I cannot provide any more details about the steps needed to reproduce this error. If a fix is developed I can test it before it is delivered. Here's the stack trace (as much of it as I'm allowed to release):
